articles.description: Royal historian Hugo Vickers said Prince Charles is falsely portrayed as "a kind of wimp, and evil and unpleasant."

articles.author: By Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.com
articles.title: Mariah Carey announces Ariana Grande and Jennifer Hudson will lead line-up for Christmas special - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 50-year-old singer took to her Instagram on Wednesday to announce Mariah Carey's Christmas Special on AppleTV+ which is set to stream on December 4.
articles.content:
All Mariah Carey wants for Christmas is for you to watch her special.
